name: Duck's Untitled Game
description:
Press Esc at the beginning and you'll see the controls unless you play Hollow Knight, in which case, you're a chad, and the controls are so far the same.

In the case you are lazy, here's the controls:

Arrow Keys - Directions/Movement , selecting dialogue choices

Up Key - Talking (where you can, there's only one talking character anyways, so...)

Z - Jump, advance/skip dialogue

X - Attack

C - Dash attack (charges on top right, also makes you invulnerable and can mess enemy projectiles)

esc - Pauses the game, also shows the instructions 

; - Activates hard mode for the boss fight, you can check if you're in hard mode by looking at the player character, which turns slightly red.

Notes:

1. If you sucked balls in the boss fight, and you find out you haven't died even with 0 hp, don't be surprised...

I NEVER ADDED DEATH (lol), so that the difficulty can be tested I want the fight to last until the end. If you happen to find things way too easy or hard, tell me, because I am convinced the game is imbalanced, for I have had no time to balance things.

2. There's a bug at the very end of the boss fight which I don't have enough time to fix, but it affects nothing. Just restart the game if you want to replay it. And try hard mode by pressing ; before the fight starts. 

3. In any case, I'll add the boss fight music later, but once I actually have the guts and willpower to finish it.

4. Sound Effects from random sound effect websites (and cursed hollow knight ones). All other assets by me. No free or paid assets used otherwise, other than the time I paid to make this game if that counts (lol).

5. kirbioifyouseethisplsfollowmeontwitter.mp3
developers: Game Research And Development Club - CU
